title: Collaborator
description: Collaborator presents a unique opportunity for teachers and students of theatre to explore issues, processes and the personnel associated with the creation of a new piece of Australian Theatre. This CD ROM provides insight into the creation of Arena Theatre Compnay's PANACEA through interviews, formal and informal, with the artists involved and footage of the production in both rehearsal and in performance.  Peter Robert, Head of Drama, Yarra Valley Grammar School
related_objects: Collection; B1004014; PAML pilot project collection; Active; 01 Sep 2000-01 Dec 2000
